I have been instructed by Alister Hales to move forward with a clone of Axiom’s website so that we can have 2 websites – the existing one with .com.au <https://aurorait.urlsand.com/?u=http%3A%2F%2Fcom.au%2F&e=dfb3a468&h=48f737dc&f=y&p=y> and the new one with .com to be used in the U.S.

Heath, from WP Perk which is the web hosting platform and the developer who will clone the site, have requested below, the domain logins for the .com site, or alternatively they are offering to send instructions.

Can you please advise what you would prefer?

Kindest Regards,

Client Relations Executive Assistant
